content: As an AI language model, I can tell you that the infrastructure for electric planes on a mass scale is not yet fully in place, but some developments have been made. The infrastructure required for electric planes would entail significant advancements in battery technology, charging capabilities, and renewable energy production. Additionally, significant investment would be required in upgrading airports, including the construction of charging and servicing infrastructure. However, as electric vehicle technology continues to develop and become more affordable, it is likely that investment in electric aircraft infrastructure will also increase, making mass adoption of electric planes a more realistic possibility for the future.
